claims.object: Shielding effectiveness requirements for Radio Frequency (RF) doors and their application into a shielded enclosure
Shielding on PCBs (Board Level Shielding or BLS)

surface_layer.definition: Techniques used to reduce electromagnetic interference.

deep_layer.mechanism: Employing conductive barriers to attenuate electromagnetic radiation.
deep_layer.origin: Developed with the rise of electronic devices and radio communication.

epistemic_metadata.source: Radio Frequency Interference (RFI) Shielding Principles, EMC/EMI Shielding Explained - Harwin, A Basic Overview of EMI Shielding Techniques & Concepts
